## Research Code

### Drone Operator Allocation for Autonomous Swarms  
**Python, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib**

Risk-constrained stochastic model for determining feasible operator-to-drone ratios in multi-zone human-on-the-loop operations.

- GitHub: https://github.com/TadhgTM/drone-operator-allocation
- Paper (PDF): assets/papers/drone_operator_allocation.pdf

---

### Carbon Taxation in General Equilibrium  
**Python, NumPy, SciPy**

Dynamic and static GE models of the Canadian economy with heterogeneous energy technologies.

- GitHub: https://github.com/TadhgTM/Energy-Taxation-Project

---

### Production Networks & Policy Constraints (WIP)

Simulation tools for studying investment and reallocation in constrained supply networks.
